author: jdonnerstag
msg: Property files are now reloadable, similar to markup files.
Fixed the outstanding bugs/issues with key resolution in application property files.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: Eelco asked to have a means to automatically prefix all absolute href (and src) attr values (URL starts with "/") with the web apps context path. Here it is.
Note: it is NOT automatically added to the list of markup filters, you have to do it manually. Please see the javadoc and the junit test case on how to do it.

Note: The reason why it is not added by default is because it prevents access to all other web apps on the same server which your web apps addresses by "/myApp333/myPage.html" because it will be prefix like "/myApp/myApp333/myPage.html"
